kernfrasen: Is there no balm in Gilead; is there no physician there?
sickness, a malady, a sinful disease
trifling with a terrible and fatal disease — sin
healing of his crimson flow might make us clean
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SIN IS SICKNESS; SALVATION IS MEDICINE

kernfrasen: slid back with a perpetual backsliding
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: LIFE IS A JOURNEY; SIN IS STRAYING/BACKSLIDING

kernfrasen: The harvest is past, the summer is ended
as a root out of a dry ground
balm tree was not a tree of beauty
dominante_domeinen.conceptuele_metafoor: SPIRITUAL OPPORTUNITY IS A HARVEST SEASON

metafoor_inventaris.metafoor_expressie: Sin... destroys the nervous system of conscience and wrecks the power of right thinking.

cognitieve_implicaties: Sin is an internal, systemic failure rather than just an external act.
theologische_implicaties: The sinner is incapacitated and cannot self-heal.
ethische_implicaties: Moral failure is a symptom of a deeper internal rot.
onbedoelde_consequenties: May diminish personal agency if sin is viewed purely as a biological-style pathology.

metafoor_inventaris.vitaliteit_toelichting: The preacher updates the ancient 'sickness' metaphor with modern clinical language ('nervous system') to re-engage the hearer.

coherentie_analyse.coherentie_verklaring: The sermon is exceptionally coherent because it anchors all theological claims in the single source domain of the 'Balm of Gilead' (Medical/Botanical).

succesvolle_blending.blending_strategie: The preacher uses the physical extraction of resin (piercing the tree) as the bridge to the crucifixion (piercing Christ).

sterktes.beschrijving: Takes a 'dead' or conventional metaphor (Jesus as Physician) and revitalizes it through specific botanical details of the balsam tree.
sterktes.voorbeeld: The healing power... was in the thick liquid which flowed out... by cutting and piercing the tree.

risicos.beschrijving: By framing sin exclusively as a disease, the juridical aspect of guilt and the need for justice may be obscured.
risicos.voorbeeld: What other word can describe the sickness which brings us to rebellion...
risicos.potentiele_impact: Congregation may view themselves as victims of a condition rather than responsible agents.

text_world_analyse.primaire_wereld: An ancient Judean landscape where merchants bring exotic resins via camel caravans.
sub_worlds: The 19th-century world of the preacher's father.
The internal 'nervous system' of the human conscience.
The political 'game' of Egypt and Babylonia.

versterkte_schemas.hoe_versterkt: Framed as the 'Source of being' from which we are estranged.

verstoorde_schemas.verstoring_strategie: Directly refutes the idea that education or 'cultural lag' explains human evil.
verstoorde_schemas.vervangend_schema: Sin as a fatal, systemic disease.

schema_analyse.liturgische_schema_aansluiting: Strongly aligns with the 'Great Physician' hymnody tradition.

aanbevelingen.metafoor_audit_samenvatting: The sermon is a masterclass in the Medical Domain. It uses the 'SIN IS SICKNESS' metaphor not just as a passing reference, but as the structural backbone of the entire message. The preacher successfully maps the properties of the Balm (exotic origin, lack of beauty, extraction through wounding) onto the person and work of Christ.

revitalisatie_suggesties.suggestie: Deepen the source by describing the specific 'aromatic' or 'pungent' nature of the balm to engage the sense of smell.
revitalisatie_suggesties.voorbeeld: The scent of the balm filled the room, overmastering the stench of the disease.

coherentie_verbeteringen.incoherentie: The shift from 'disease' (internal) to 'missing the mark' (external/archery) is brief.
coherentie_verbeteringen.resolutie_strategie: Stick to the clinical language of 'loss of coordination' to keep the medical schema intact.

entailment_checks.problematisch_entailment: Patients are not usually blamed for their diseases.
entailment_checks.aanbeveling: Explicitly state that this is a 'disease of the will' to maintain moral responsibility.

alternatieve_domeinen.rationale: To balance the 'healing' aspect with the 'judgment' mentioned regarding Nebuchadnezzar.

aanbevelingen.slotopmerking: A powerful example of how a single, well-developed conceptual metaphor can provide more theological clarity than a dozen scattered images.

comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_esthetiek: While an aesthetic analysis would praise the 'balm' imagery for its beauty, CMT reveals it as a cognitive tool for understanding the mechanics of the Atonement.
comparatieve_analyse.verschil_met_kolb: Unlike Kolb's focus on learning styles, CMT shows how the preacher uses embodied experience (pain/healing) to bypass intellectual resistance.
comparatieve_analyse.unieke_inzichten_CMT: CMT highlights the 'Importation' mapping—that because the balm is not native to Palestine, salvation cannot be 'native' to human effort.

volledige_metafoor_lijst: Slid back with a perpetual backsliding
appendices.notities: The sermon relies heavily on the 'Isaiah 53' sub-schema to bridge the Medical and Sacrificial domains.
